import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Grid, Col, Row, Image, Carousel, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Carousel.css"; class ControlledCarousel extends Component { constructor(props, context) { super(props, context); this.handleSelect = this.handleSelect.bind(this); this.state = { index: 0, direction: null }; } handleSelect(selectedIndex, e) { this.setState({ index: selectedIndex, direction: e.direction }); } render() { const { index, direction } = this.state; return (
